name: Tarek محمد Al Towireb
skills_sentences: Red Hat system administration and security
responsibility_sentences: Evaluate information security solutions in the market
Communicate with vendors and distributors for information security solutions
Consult on information security solutions to customers
Develop roadmap disaster recovery, business continuity, and incident response plans documents
Follow National Cybersecurity Authority cybersecurity controls and Saudi Arabian Monetary Authority cybersecurity framework
Lead Microsoft Dynamics Customer Relationship Management project as project manager
Lead technical security operations and project management for information security projects
Perform gap assessment, governance risk and compliance, and awareness for potential customers
Prepare technical writeups and technical proposals
